original_text: Of the three, he was more honourable than the two; for he was their captain: howbeit he attained not to the first three.
korean_text: 그는 둘째 세 명 가운데에 가장 뛰어나 그들의 우두머리가 되었으나 첫째 세 명에게는 미치지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: he was more honourable than the two
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 두 사람보다 더 존귀하였으며

sentences.original_text: howbeit he attained not to the first three
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 처음 세 사람에게는 미치지 못하였다
